app_update_alert.title: New update is available! Would you like to install it now?

multistream_page.title: Select stream and drag it over here.

notifications_page.title: notifications
notifications_page.header_msg: Sorry, but notifications are not available in this version!
notifications_page.message: We will deploy them when they are ready. For now you can try send test notification.

restart_alert.title: Application must be restarted for changes to work. Would you like to restart now?

logout_alert.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

updates.title: Version and Updates
updates.msg_1: Update will be installed automatically without notifications.
updates.msg_2: Check if a newer version is available.

dev_console.title: developer console
dev_console.message: Enable dev console for test purposes.
dev_console.alert_msg: Need to restart app to enable developer console.

rendering.title: cpu rendering
rendering.message: Turning this on will use your CPU to make app faster.
rendering.alert_msg_1: Turn this off if you experiencing troubles.
rendering.alert_msg_2: Need to restart app to enable cpu rendering.

integrations_settings.title: Integrations
integrations_settings.sub_title: Connect this accounts and unlock special integrations with MTTV.

discord.presence_description: Show everyone on discord what you are watching.

mute.title: mute player
mute.message: Sound will be turned off when you visit someone's stream.

autoplay_stream.title: autoplay stream
autoplay_stream.message: Stream will start automatically when you visit someone's channel.

autoplay_video.title: autoplay video
autoplay_video.message: Video will start automatically when you open it.

resizable.title: resizable mini player
resizable.message: You can resize mini player when it is activated.
resizable.alert_msg: Need to restart app to make mini player resizable.

mp_size.title: mini player size
mp_size.message: You can specify starting size of a mini player.

languages_settings.title: Language
languages_settings.message: If you didn't find preferred language you can contact us and help us with it!

notifications_settings.title: Notifications
notifications_settings.header_msg: Sorry, but notifications are not available in this version!
notifications_settings.message: We will deploy them when they are ready.

clips.title: Clips
clips.header_msg: Sorry, but channel clips are not available in this version!
clips.message: We will deploy them when they are ready.

unfollow_alert.message: Are you sure you want to unfollow
